member.name: CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC.CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC.CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC structure that is initialized with info for a counter.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the type of counter.

member.name: CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC.CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_COUNTER_DESC
member.summary: Represents a counter and provides convenience methods for creating counters.
